G

getChar(char) - Method in class enigma.Machine
Takes an UPPERCASE character as an input and returns the encrypted/decrypted character in UPPERCASE
getChildRotorSettings() - Method in class enigma.RotorGroup
Returns array of settings of all the rotors in this enigma.RotorGroup object.
getMachineBySetting(String, String[], int[], String[]) - Static method in class enigma.Machine
A method that allows one to create a machine very easily using String representation of all the required Enigma machine components.
getPosition(int) - Method in class enigma.Reflector
Finds the position wired to another position.
getPosition(int) - Method in class enigma.RotorGroup
Returns the position which forms a circuit on the leftmost end for a given position on the rightmost end
getPositionInverse(int) - Method in class enigma.RotorGroup
Returns the position which forms a circuit on the rightmost end for a given position on the leftmost end.
getReflectorByName(String) - Static method in class enigma.Reflector
Creates a enigma.Reflector object, given the name of the enigma.Rotor.
getRotorGroupByNames(String[], int[]) - Static method in class enigma.RotorGroup
Useful for creating a enigma.RotorGroup object, given the names of each rotor and their corresponding settings (these rotor names must be available in WiringInfo class)
